channel.title: Epicurus?
channel.description: [size=18pt]Hi guys, i was just wondering if anyone knows whats going on with Epicurus private server. Is it not working anymore or..? If you know anything about this please let me know. Im feeling kinda lost and mad because i just donated like 3 or 4 days ago and now all of the sudden its not working???

item.title: Epicurus?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Step 1 - Hardly anyone here knows about individual private servers, try to contact the owner instead.
Step 2 - Don’t spend real life money on untrustworthy people, chances are they wont spend it on what you think they will, and they may just turn around and stab you in the back (take the money and run or whatever)

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Why not just PM the owner of the server…

Read full topic

item.title: Epicurus?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Epicurus was an ancient Greek philosopher.

On a serious note, Moparscape isn’t the place to be asking questions about individually owned servers. I’m tired of seeing these post, and in the past month the number of these kind of post have increased, who know’s why.

Read full topic
